meanings.definition: relating to or characteristic of an entrepreneur
meanings.sent1: Her entrepreneurial spirit led her to start her own business.
meanings.sent2: The company's success was due to its entrepreneurial approach to innovation.
meanings.sent3: The cat showed an entrepreneurial attitude by trying to open the treat jar.
meanings.sent4: His mind was an entrepreneurial playground, always exploring new ideas.
meanings.sent5: The entrepreneurial energy in the room was palpable, driving everyone to think outside the box.

meanings.definition: showing initiative and willingness to take risks
meanings.sent1: Taking on the challenging project was a truly entrepreneurial move.
meanings.sent2: She made an entrepreneurial decision to invest in the startup.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel's attempt to steal birdseed was quite entrepreneurial.
meanings.sent4: His entrepreneurial spirit soared as he pitched his unique business idea.
meanings.sent5: The team's entrepreneurial drive pushed them to explore new markets fearlessly.

meanings.definition: engaged in the activities of an entrepreneur
meanings.sent1: The group of entrepreneurial individuals worked together to launch the new product.
meanings.sent2: She joined the entrepreneurial community to network and learn from others.
meanings.sent3: The penguin's fish-catching technique was surprisingly entrepreneurial.
meanings.sent4: He approached the challenge with an entrepreneurial mindset, seeking opportunities in every obstacle.
meanings.sent5: The entrepreneurial team brainstormed ideas late into the night, fueled by passion and determination.
